name: gutruncate
tagline: jQuery plugin to truncate text with a read more / read less button.
body:
gutruncate ========== jQuery plugin to truncate text with a read more / read less button. ## Usage ```javascript $(".my-long-text").gutruncate(); ``` ## Advanced Usage ```javascript $(".my-long-text").gutruncate({ minLength: 150, //amount of text to show tolerance: 20, //amount of tolerance readMoreText: "see more", //text of the read more link readLessText: "see less", //text of the read less link ellipsisText: "...", //what to use to signify the text has been truncated reapply: false //if true gutruncate will be recreated }); ``` ## Demo
